title: Baptisms & Dogs: Stories
description: Baptisms & Dogs--features twelve stories ranging from matters of faith to broken homes and everything in-between. Set in the fictional town of Seton, Kentucky, each character wrestles with the moral dilemma of giving up or choosing to fight. This regional collection follows various characters along unique (and often humorous) journeys towards the answers they seek. It is a gritty, wild ride.
author: Brian L. Tucker
